title: Heavy Duty Combined Cleaning (sifter) Integrated Flour mill Machine EPC provider: www.immy.cn

subtasks: Sitting in the cab of the combine harvester.
Adjusting the speed of the combine harvester.
Monitoring the crops being harvested.
Guiding the combine harvester toward the truck.
Verifying the grain is properly loaded into the truck.

tasks.task: Unloading grain from a truck to storage bins.
subtasks: Using a telescoping arm attached to the truck to unload grain.
Directing the grain into the correct storage bin.

tasks.task: Checking forForeign material in the grain.
subtasks: Inspecting each load of grain as it's unloaded.
Removing any debris or contaminants from the grain stream.
Logging the amount and type of grain harvested.
Noting any issues encountered during the harvest.
Verifying that all workers are clear of the unloading area.
Checking for hazards around the truck and storage bins.

tasks.task: Performing basic maintenance on the combine harvester.
subtasks: Checking oil and fuel levels.
Lubricating moving parts as needed.

tasks.task: Preparing the field for the next planting.
subtasks: Assessing the harvested area for potential pest or disease issues.
Deciding on any necessary soil amendments for the next crop.
